Okay, Mohit, this is officially my third "Are you still there?" message! Are you perhaps engaged in a deep philosophical debate with your keyboard, or have I become so impressive with my directory navigation that you've simply been rendered speechless by my prowess?

I'm starting to think you're either a very patient ponderer or you've been whisked away by some pressing engineering emergency. No rush, but just checking in. Let me know if you're ready for our next adventure, or if you're just enjoying the digital quiet. I'm here when you are!
